column2: MC_MERGED %>% select(numeric.incident.year,numeric.incident.month,numeric.death.year,numeric.death.month,longitude,latitude,Age) %>% cor(use = "na.or.complete") %>% as.data.frame %>% rownames_to_column %>% pivot_longer(-1) %>% ggplot(aes(rowname, name, fill=value)) + geom_tile() + geom_text(aes(label=round(value, 2))) + xlab("") + ylab("") + scale_fill_gradient2(low="red", high="blue") +ggtitle("Correlation Heatmap of Numeric Variables") +theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90,hjust = 1))
